nodes.text: Ledeve was a jungle astronomical object located in the galaxy. The Jedi Order constructed a Jedi Temple on Ledeve, and later rediscovered it during the Clone Wars. General Grievous encountered a Jedi and a Padawan, killing them both. He learnt of their search for the Jedi temple, entering it himself. Grievous later had the temple destroyed by an orbiting Providence-class Dreadnought.
